text: Will Hutchins (born Marshall Lowell Hutchason; May 5, 1930 â€“ April 21, 2025) was an American actor. He was known for his lead role of the young lawyer Tom Brewster, in the Western television series Sugarfoot. He was born in Los Angeles, California. His career began in 1956 and he retired in 2010. He had small roles in the Warners movies Bombers B-52 (1957), Lafayette Escadrille (1958), and No Time for Sergeants (1958). Hutchins died on April 21, 2025 in Manhasset, New York from respiratory failure, aged 94.Will Hutchins, Star of ABC's 'Sugarfoot,' Dies at 94 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1930 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: Will Hutchins
